name: FUT 19 DRAFT & DATABASE
description:
Ever wanted to simulate your FUT 19 draft? You are in the right place. With our FUT Draft Simulator you will be able to get better in choosing the right players for your drafts.

Let’s enjoy the fun of building drafts for free!

Features:
-Draft Simulator: Create and play with realistic FUT 19 Drafts.
-Simulate Tournament: Play against famous clubs all over the world & Realistic score simulation of matches.
-SBC: Complete squad building challenges to get special rewards.
-Squad Builder: Build the best possible Squad with the cards you have collected.
-Collect Cards: Open up packs with an all new pack opening animation.
-Database: Cards of different clubs, leagues, card types.

Privacy Policy: http://www.ucancreatordev.com/privacypolicy.pdf
Term of Use: http://www.ucancreatordev.com/termsofuse.pdf
